items.task: Buy lightweight, breathable clothing suitable for Bangkok's heat and humidity.
Purchase a universal travel adapter for charging electronics in Thailand.
Get a small, secure cross-body bag or fanny pack for daily excursions.
Stock up on sunscreen (high SPF) and insect repellent.
Buy comfortable walking sandals or shoes for exploring temples and markets.
Acquire a portable power bank for phone and gadget charging on the go.
Purchase a quick-dry towel for convenience, especially if visiting beaches or pools.
Get any necessary over-the-counter medications (e.g., anti-diarrhea, pain relievers).
Consider buying a small, foldable umbrella for sun protection or sudden rain.
